channel.title: About on Gabe Nespoli

item.title: About
item.description: I am PhD Candidate and aspiring Data Scientist with a passion for coding my way out of complex problems. My current work explores how brains represent music, and why tapping your foot can be irresistible. I am graduating in September and will be looking to start a career in data science. Skills: data analysis, machine learning, signal processing, research design, EEG Tools: MATLAB/Octave, Python, R, Linux, git, vim   resume
